content: President Obama has revealed that he talks to President Bush on a regular basis. I believe that one of the reasons he wanted to "look ahead" instead of prosecuting over torture was to protect George Bush. Presidents characteristically look out for each other. Now that the Republicans are calling for a torture investigation, it could threaten 43.

content: I don't believe what I hear Presidents say in speeches. I believe what I see them do. I know that President Bush met face to face with the families of fallen Soldiers and Marines. I saw him meeting face to face with Katrina victims when they weren't at their best. A young girl ran up to him crying and reached out to embrace him. He embraced and held her and was kind to her. I've never seen a U.S. President do that before. A friend of mine worked for a week at the site of the Greensburg Kansas Disaster. My friend was working in a Kansas Emergency Operations trailer and he told me that Bush came in the trailer and sat with him and they talked for quite a while. Some time later President Bush showed up for the Greensburg High School Graduation where he spent time with the Graduates prior to their commencement ceremony. This event was televised on the Planet Green Series about the town of Greensburg.
reply: I don't believe what I hear Presidents say in speeches. I believe what I see them do. I know that President Bush met face to face with the families of fallen Soldiers and Marines. I saw him meeting face to face with Katrina victims when they weren't at their best. A young girl ran up to him crying and reached out to embrace him. He embraced and held her and was kind to her. content: In my lifetime, I've never seen a POTUS more vilified mercilessly than GWB. Sure, he's done some things that I didn't favor or agree with BUT, I do know ONE THING! We have not been attacked in the 8 years of his Presidency. To echo what ProgMod said about Bush: I can't wait till Obama and the loons on the left get kicked out of office. JMHO, I could be wrong...
